OOC: Okay, Dewboy, I never want to speak to you again, because it's obvious=
 that you lack a brain and proper etiquette. And I KNOW Optimus was reforma=
tted, it happened in Beast Machines, but in THIS RPG, Beast Machines never =
happened, how many times do you need to be told that?...

BIC: A single sta=
sis pod drops to Earth.

OOC: What? Thought I'd bail out on the RPG? That w=
ould be like a rat (I was a rat) leaving a sinking ship! (This RPG was a si=
nking ship. But now, I plan to do all I can to help. So, here he is, first =
team to collect my new bot, well, gets him, simple. Just make the subject b=
e something I can recognize, just in case I mistake it for another pod. Oka=
y? OKAY!

BIC: The pod doesn't scan, because this was not an Axalon Pod. Th=
e pod was from Cybertron, and Cybertron was not organic! Incredible!...

  =
